name: Sweet Corn Tomalito
author: THEKIRKLANDS
summary: Steamed corn pudding made on the stovetop.  This is a traditional Tex-Mex side dish that is a great side to any meal. Well worth the wait.
directions: In a medium bowl, mix together the margarine, masa flour, and sugar until light and fluffy
In a food processor or blender, blend one cup of the corn kernels with the water and cornmeal just until smooth
Mix in the remaining corn, baking powder, salt, and milk until the batter is smooth
Place the tomalito over a large saucepan of simmering water, and cover tightly with aluminum foil
Steam for 50 to 60 minutes, or until firm
Check water occasionally, and refill if necessary
Stir pudding before serving to give it a consistent texture
